title: Alexandre Bohyn
text:
After graduating from UCLouvain in Soil and Water management, I developed an interest for statistics than led me to do a master in Statistics in KU Leuven. There, I met Peter Goos who became my Ph.D. promoter. I am now studying design of experiments and their applications to robustify protocol for cell-based bio-assays. I am currently working on the enumeration and characterization of large regular mixed-level designs.



KU Leuven | Leuven, Belgium
Ph.D. in Design of Experiments | September 2019 - Present
M.S. in Statistics | Specialization in Biostatistics | September 2017 - September 2019
UCLouvain | Louvain-la-Neuve, Belgium
M.S. in Bioscience engineering | Specialization in Soil and Water management | September 2015 - September 2017
B.S. in Bioscience engineering | Specialization in Environmental sciences | September 2011 - September 2015
